name: @ghostspeak/cli
description: Modern CLI for ghostspeak - Autonomous Agent Commerce Protocol

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run compile
scripts.compile: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --external @solana/addresses --external @solana/codecs --external @solana/rpc --external @solana/rpc-types --external @solana/signers --external chalk --external commander --external conf --external semver
scripts.build:optimized: bun build src/index-lightweight.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --external @ghostspeak/sdk --external @solana/addresses --external @solana/codecs --external @solana/rpc --external @solana/rpc-types --external @solana/signers --external chalk --external commander --external conf --external semver

author: ghostspeak Contributors
